channel.title: Experiment on What The Blog?
channel.description: Recent content in Experiment on What The Blog?

item.title: The Experiment: A Breadth-First Search on Careers
item.description: Context I recently finished an undergrad degree at a college I hated (horribly bureaucratic, untrained professors, donkey-work for projects/assignments). I feel like I have a 4 year debt to make up for - skills I should have learned in my undergrad, but never had the time to. In the coming year or so, I’m hoping to fix that by experimenting much more, and hopefully picking up skills that I think are important to me.
